text: wjel hwla' almushrikun aljini shuraka' lilah taealaa fi alebadt; aetqadana minhum 'anahum ynfewn 'aw ydrwn, waqad khalaqahum allah taealaa wama yaebudun min aledm, fahu almustaqili bialkhalq whdh, fyjb 'an yastaqila balebadt wahdah la sharik lh. walaqad kadhab hwla' almushrikun ealaa allah taealaa hin nsbu 'iilayh albanin walbnat; jhla minhum bima yjb lah min sifat alkmal, tnzzah wela eamaa nsbh 'iilayh almushrikun min dhlk alkadhib walaftra'
